author: Rebecca Boone / AP
title: Ski Vacation Hot Spot Becomes Coronavirus Ground Zero in Idaho
description: With over 80 confirmed cases of COVID-19, Blaine County has the highest rate of cases outside NYC and its surrounding counties.
content:
(BOISE, Idaho) — A scenic Idaho county known as a ski-vacation haven for celebrities and the wealthy has a new, more dubious distinction: It has one of the highest per-capita rates of confirmed coronavirus infections in America.
